channel.title: PyCon on Mariatta
channel.description: Recent content in PyCon on Mariatta

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ Python Brasil 2022
item.description: Del Monte Gelateria I found Del Monte Gelateria inside Manaura shopping mall, which was walking distance from the hotel I was staying. I had trouble choosing a flavor because everything looks so good! Most people don’t speak english very well, but I was able to order what I want by pointing at the display üòù View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Colombia 2022
item.description: Cows Ice Cream Whistler I gave a keynote speech at PyCon Colombia. It was an online event, so I didn’t actually get to have ice cream in Colombia. Perhaps one day. While on a camping trip to Whistler, I decided to get my Ice Cream Selfie at Cows Ice cream, which is a favorite place for us. Each time we’re there, there’s always a long lineup. üç¶üòùü§≥ #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconcolombia #PyConColombia2022

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon APAC 2021
item.description: Bella Gelateria I gave a keynote speech at PyCon APAC 2021, which was hosted by PyCon Thailand. This was an online event, so I didn’t actually go to Thailand for this. However, I found an ice cream flavour that represent Thailand: Thai Coconut Milk Gelato from Bella Gelateria! Bella Gelateria has one of the best ice cream in Vancouver, they’ve won many awards! Belated #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconapac @pyconthailand üáπüá≠üêç üç¶üòùü§≥

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2021
item.description: Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream If you ever come to Port Moody, you must make a stop at Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream. All of their ice creams are made from scratch locally, and they have vegan options too. üç¶üòùü§≥ The time has come for #IceCreamSelfie #PyCon #PyConUS #PyConUS2021 Whiskey Hazelnut and Chocolate Brownie Ice Cream @ Vashti Rose Ice Cream pic.twitter.com/eUmMbIKECH — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) May 15, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Belarus 2021
item.description: Matteo’s Gelato I went to Matteo’s Gelato in Port Coquitlam for this one, after first taking a stroll along Coquitlam River @ Lions Park. Cr√®me br√ªl√©e and chocolate hazelnut gelato from Matteo's Gelato in Port Coquitlam. My reward for giving @pyconby closing keynote. üç¶üòùü§≥ #IceCreamSelfie pic.twitter.com/i3zume2skU — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) March 14, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ SeaGL, PyCon Indonesia, PyCon Poland 2020
item.description: It was 2020. I joined so many virtual conferences, and at one point, I was a speaker at three different conferences all in one same weekend. 2020 was also, a challenging time, I didn’t get to go out a lot. I didn’t even get to do my Ice cream selfie after the conference. Finally, on new year’s eve, we decided to celebrate and go out. While in Robson Street, we stopped by a Korean grocery store and my kids saw some boba milk tea ice cream bar for sale.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan 2020
item.description: Rocky Point Ice Cream 2020, the year of virtual conferences for me. I get to speak at two different conferences happening in the same weekend: PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan. I decided to just get two scoops of ice cream from one shop. This is from Rocky Point Ice Cream. Thanks @pyconau and @PyConTW for having me! I gave talk at two conferences in the same weekend so I think I deserve the two scoops of ice cream from @RPIceCream (I picked matcha green tea and espresso flakes flavours)#IceCreamSelfie üç¶üòùü§≥ pic.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2020
item.description: PyCon US 2020 was cancelled, but I still decided to record a tutorial for it. Since everything was still closed down at that time, so I just bought some ice cream and ice cream cones from the grocery store. Just doing #IceCreamSelfie in my own backyard üç¶üòùü§≥ pic.twitter.com/CiwD4c4fl1 — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) April 24, 2020

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon DE 2019
item.description: Hokey Pokey Lucie recommended this place, and we met up and get to chat and catch up. Check out Eispatisserie Hokey Pokey in Berlin! A special #IceCreamSelfie with @Patjouk #PyConDE üç¶üòùü§≥ pic.twitter.com/SFoQy6JI1x — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) October 13, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyBay 2019
item.description: The Baked Bear The Baked Bear is known for their ice cream sandwiches! üç¶üòùü§≥ #IceCreamSelfie #PyBay2019 pic.twitter.com/GE6icRnLW6 — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) August 19, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2019
item.description: Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches PyCon US 2019 was a busy one for me. I gave a talk, a tutorial, and also ran the first Mentored Sprints with Nina Zakharenko and Tania Allard, AND co-chaired the Python Language Summit for the first time üòµ (I ended up co-charing it for 4 years). I went to Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches. The ice cream sandwich was really yummy! üòã I’m sad to hear that this place has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2018
item.description: Mitchell’s Ice Cream At PyCon US 2018, I gave my talk What is a Python Core Developer. It was emotionally difficult to give that talk ü•≤ I went to Mitchell’s HomeMade Ice cream to celebrate. üç¶üòãü§≥ pic.twitter.com/MG8XdAqulv — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) May 14, 2018

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Canada 2017
item.description: La Cabane De Danny PyCon Canada happened in November, in Montreal. It was freezing cold outside, but didn’t stop me from getting ice cream. I found La Cabane De Danny, and they make ice cream with bubble waffle cone. So fun! The matcha ice cream was real good! Unfortunately this shop has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon AU 2017
item.description: Milkcow Australia I realized that this is the first time I’ve used the #IceCreamSelfie hashtag!! Unfortunately, this place has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2017
item.description: What’s the Scoop PDX After giving my talk, Dial M For Mentor, I was feeling quite stressed out. My friend Jeff asked if there’s anything that would make me feel better, and I said “I wanna go get ice cream”. So we went to this place that he knew about. At that time, I didn’t consider Ice Cream Selfie to be a “thing” yet, but I think this is when it becomes a real “tradition”.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon Europe, PyCon Italy 2017
item.description: Hero image photo by Bartek Pawlik, DjangoCon Europe. Icy Dot Wine I was just walking around in Florence, having given my talk at two conferences in the same week: PyCon Italy and DjangoCon Europe 2017. At that time, Ice cream selfie isn’t quite a ritual yet, so I didn’t even know which shop this was. After many years, I tracked down the shop name! This was from Icy Dot Wine.
